message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SOC. 

The paper deals with rankings and fairness in selection-making and recommender systems, which are topics related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses biases and unfair distribution of opportunities and resources, which are topics related to social and information networks (cs.SI) and computational social science (cs.CY). Finally, the paper proposes a novel mechanism to achieve fairness in rankings, which is a topic related to social choice and voting theory (cs.SOC).
